items.name: Veg Jalfrezi
items.description: Mix veggies cooked with onion, tomato puree, ginger, garlic and stir fried on high heat and sprinkled with fresh garam masala and cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bengali Kancha Lonka Murgi
items.description: A spicy and flavorful Bengali chicken dish, made with green chilies, ginger and other aromatic spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pinewheel Samosa
items.description: A savory Indian snack that features a spiced potato filling rolled into a flaky pastry dough, sliced and baked to create a pinwheel shape. (6 pieces)

items.name: Missal Pav
items.description: A popular street food of Mumbai. Mixed sprouts boiled and cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chilles and spicy masala. Topped with some fresh coriander. Served with 2 buns, farsan and onions

items.name: Aloo Gobi Posto
items.description: A classic Bengali dish made with potatoes, cauliflower and poppy seed paste. The dish has a creamy texture and a subtle flavor that comes from the poppy seed paste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dim Jhol
items.description: A traditional Bengali dish that consists of boiled eggs cooked in a light and spicy curry made with onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, and various aromatic spices such as cumin, coriander, and turmeric.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions and lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Tomato Rice
items.description: Rice cooked with onions & tomato, tempered with mustard seeds, peanuts and fresh curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Malabar Chickpea & Coconut Curry
items.description: A delicious and flavorful Indian curry dish that originates from the Malabar region of Kerala. It is made with chickpeas, coconut milk, and a blend of aromatic spices, creating a creamy and comforting dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bafat Dukra
items.description: A signature dish of Manglorian catholics. Slow cooked pork belly cooked with a special blend of bafat spices, onion, garlic and ginger.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer made with marinated and fried chicken pieces tossed in a spicy and tangy sauce.

items.name: Aloo Pyaz Paratha
items.description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced potato and onion. Served with onion-tomato chutney

items.name: Veg Nizami Pulao
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish that is popular in the Nizam region of India. It is made with long-grain Basmati rice, a variety of vegetables, aromatic spices, and garnished with fried onions and cashews.

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb Biryani
items.description: A classic Indian rice dish that is layered with succulent lamb meat and aromatic spices. The meat is marinated in yogurt and spices, and cooked separately with fragrant rice, saffron, and fried onions. The two are then layered together and slow-cooked on low heat, allowing the flavors to blend together perfectly.

items.name: Railway Style Cutlet
items.description: A nostalgic treat made of deep fried spicy potato. It's a perfect texure of soft potato filling with a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney (4 cutlets)

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with rice and papad.

items.name: Paneer Lababdar
items.description: Indian cottage cheese in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy. The dish is typically spiced with a blend of aromatic Indian spices and finished with a touch of cream and butter for a rich flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Punjabi Lamb Kheema Masala
items.description: A spicy and flavorful Indian dish made with ground lamb cooked with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic Indian spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Paneer 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer made with cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that have been marinated in a blend of spices and then deep-fried until crispy. The dish is spiced with a mix of chili powder, cumin, and coriander, and served with a side of chutney

items.name: Kerai Molagutal
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish made with a variety of greens (keerai) cooked in a spicy coconut-based gravy. The dish is typically spiced with a blend of aromatic South Indian spices, such as cumin, coriander, and black pepper, giving it a bold and flavorful taste. Served with rice and papad.

items.name: Lagan nu Stew
items.description: A hearty and flavorful dish from the Gujarati-Parsi cuisine of India. It is a vegetarian stew made with a variety of vegetables and dal (lentils) cooked in a fragrant blend of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Berry Pulao
items.description: A popular Parsi dish that is a delicious blend of sweet and savory flavors. The dish is made with fragrant basmati rice, tender chicken, and a variety of aromatic spices. The pulao is then topped with a mix of sweet and tangy berries, caramelized onions, and nuts, giving it a beautiful and unique taste. Served with raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comfoting food from Goa. Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Bihari Dum Aloo
items.description: A popular dish originating from the state of Bihar, made with baby potatoes cooked in a spicy tomato and onion gravy. The dish is slow-cooked on low heat to infuse the flavors, resulting in soft, melt-in-your-mouth potatoes with a tangy and spicy taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dal Gosht
items.description: A dish made with lamb and lentils (dal). The dish is slow-cooked with a variety of aromatic spices, resulting in a hearty and flavorful dish that is perfect for a comforting meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Indori Pohe
items.description: A popular breakfast dish from the state of Madhya Pradesh in India. The dish is made with flattened rice flakes (poha) that have been saut√©ed with a mix of onions, potatoes, and spices, and garnished with crunchy sev (fried noodles), peanuts, and fresh coriander

items.name: Chicken Pulao
items.description: A popular dish made with fragrant basmati rice and tender pieces of chicken cooked in a flavorful broth with a blend of aromatic spices. The dish is garnished with fried onions, nuts, and fresh herbs, giving it a beautiful texture and taste.

items.name: Soya Chaap Masala
items.description: A vegetarian Indian dish made with soya chaap, a protein-rich meat substitute made from soybeans. The chaap is cooked in a flavorful onion-tomato based gravy that is spiced with a blend of aromatic Indian spices, resulting in a delicious and satisfying dish that is perfect for vegetarians
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Shalgam Gosht
items.description: A traditional dish made with lamb and turnips. The tender pieces of meat are cooked with flavorful spices and the turnips add a slightly sweet and earthy flavor to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Gobi Manchurian
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with crispy fried cauliflower florets tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce. It's a perfect vegetarian appetizer.

items.name: Vagharela Bhat
items.description: A popular Gujarati rice dish that is made by tempering cooked rice with a mix of spices, including mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and turmeric. The dish is garnished with fresh cilantro and served with a side of yogurt & achar.

items.name: Nadru Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri rice dish made with fragrant basmati rice, tender lotus stem (nadru), and a flavorful yakhni broth made with yogurt & spices. The dish is garnished with fried onions, nuts, and fresh herbs, giving it a beautiful texture. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Lamb Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A delicious and aromatic rice dish that is popular in Indian and Pakistani cuisine. The dish is made with tender lamb that has been slow-cooked in a flavorful broth (yakhni) made with aromatic spices and yogurt. The lamb and yakhni are then combined with fragrant basmati rice and cooked until tender, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying meal. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Cheese Corn Balls
items.description: Boiled potatoes mixed with cheese, paneer and green chillies coated with breadbrumbs and deep fried. Served with side of tomato ketchup. (6 pieces)

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and fresh pav bhaji masala topped with butter and fresh corriander served with 2 buns.
